column4: hey, i've got a new ubuntu 9.10 server install that i would like to have multiple IPs on different VLAN's on.  However, only the vlan I specify the gateway on works. if i specify gateway in multiple interfaces, then the last one i specify works.
looking in tcpdump shows that pings to ip's that aren't working are being received in the expected place but doesn't show any responses to them.
